GapFillDragDrop.Title: Describing places
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Click on a word/phrase and drag it to the correct gap.

Content.Question:
1. The building was so run-down that the authorities feared it would collapse.
2. Stretching across huge expanses of Europe and into Asia, Siberia is absolutely vast.
3. The library is located right in the heart of the city.
4. The diverse cuisine ranges from Indian spicy dishes to hamburgers and everything in between.
5. The concert hall was completely packed and some people were even turned away at the door.
6. If you wander off the beaten track you will find villages with no electricity or running water.
7. Compared to the noise and movement of city life, the desert seems incredibly tranquil.
8. Despite the touristy parts, most of the country remains unspoilt, keeping its traditional customs.
9. Ancient buildings stand side by side with modern skyscrapers in this magnificent city.
10. From our hotel window, the view of the sunset was absolutely stunning.
